column5: Anything between 12 V and 24 V may work but the results achieved here use 24 V. Motor speeds may need calibration to match existing results
or drip tray/other container to hold 10 mL of water
or equivalent microcontroller that can output two independent 5V PWM signals and connect to PC over USB serial
Dimensions must be at least enough to cut out approx. four 6 cm x 8 cm rectangles, an A4 sheet is enough

column1: M6 x 60 mm hex socket cap bolts

column5: Must be able to flash firmware to microcontroller and connect over USB serial to microcontroller and potentiostat
to accept 5 mm allen key or 10 mm hex socket
or laser cutter or hand tools
